contest-event.event-date: April 28, 1973 D Midlands Area (Championship Section) Midlands Area (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas.
